00084          virtual void trackframe(
00085             const TrackRefSys& frame        
00086          ) {
00087             std::auto_ptr<const TrackRefSys> trackframe(frame.clone());
00088             TrackFrame = trackframe;
00089          };
00090

00093 
00095 
00098          virtual const Site& site() {
00099             return TelSite;
00100          };
00101 
00102       protected:
00103       /*
00104          The Constructor, destructor and assignment operators are all
00105          declared protected so that Target objects cannot be created
00106          or destroyed directly.
00107       */
00108 
00110

00116             const Site& site        
00117          ) : TelSite(site),
00118             TrackFrame(defaultFrame->clone()) {};
